description: This file initializes a knowledge base with a PDF URL and vector database, then creates an agent to query the knowledge base and print a response.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from a PDF URL, utilizing vector database for storage.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer queries.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, with an option to recreate the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
